member.name: T:AluMeet.Model.AlumniModel
member.summary: The AlumniModel class represents an individual alumni entity in the application. It contains properties to store and retrieve information such as the alumni's ID, name, graduation year, contact details, twitter profile, facebook profile, linkedIn profile, email, current employer, profile picture, and current position.

member.name: P:AluMeet.Model.AlumniModel.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the alumni.

member.name: P:AluMeet.Model.AlumniModel.ProgramStudied
member.summary: Gets or sets the ProgramStudied of the alumni.

member.name: P:AluMeet.Model.AlumniModel.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the alumni.

member.name: P:AluMeet.Model.AlumniModel.GraduationYear
member.summary: Gets or sets the graduation year of the alumni.

member.name: P:AluMeet.Model.AlumniModel.ContactDetails
member.summary: Gets or sets the contact details of the alumni.

member.name: P:AluMeet.Model.AlumniModel.CurrentEmployer
member.summary: Gets or sets the current employer of the alumni.

member.name: P:AluMeet.Model.AlumniModel.CurrentPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the current position of the alumni.

member.name: P:AluMeet.Model.AlumniModel.Email
member.summary: Gets or sets the email of the alumni.

member.name: P:AluMeet.Model.AlumniModel.TwitterHandle
member.summary: Gets or sets the twitter handle of the alumni.

member.name: P:AluMeet.Model.AlumniModel.FacebookHandle
member.summary: Gets or sets the facebook profile url of the alumni.

member.name: P:AluMeet.Model.AlumniModel.LinkedInHandle
member.summary: Gets or sets the linkedIn profile url of the alumni.

member.name: P:AluMeet.Model.AlumniModel.ProfilePicture
member.summary: Gets or sets the profile picture of the alumni.

member.name: T:AluMeet.Model.JobModel
member.summary: Represents a job with details such as title, company name, location, description, and deadline.

member.name: P:AluMeet.Model.JobModel.ID
member.summary: Gets or sets the id of the job.

member.name: P:AluMeet.Model.JobModel.JobTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of the job.

member.name: P:AluMeet.Model.JobModel.CompanyName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the company offering the job.

member.name: P:AluMeet.Model.JobModel.Location
member.summary: Gets or sets the location of the job.

member.name: P:AluMeet.Model.JobModel.JobDescription
member.summary: Gets or sets the description of the job.

member.name: P:AluMeet.Model.JobModel.JobDeadline
member.summary: Gets or sets the deadline for applying to the job.
